title: Tour today- get August rent free!
posting_body: ['Back to School!', 'THE ATRII APARTMENTS IN DENVER', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'The Atrii', '5100 Leetsdale Drive, Denver, CO, 80246', 'More unit details at:', '<URL>', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 625 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Welcome home to The Atrii Apartments in Denver, CO!', "Here, you'll understand what comfortable living really means in our neighborhood near Glendale and Cherry Creek.", 'Our 1 and 2 bedroom apartments feature granite countertops, open layout kitchens, and modern black appliances with plenty of space to call your own.', 'Designed with the community in mind, our pet-friendly neighborhood houses a fitness center, clubhouse, community grills, and a heated pool with a sundeck.', 'Less than 20 minutes Southeast of downtown Denver, you can experience the best shopping, dining, and entertainment that the city has to offer.', 'Spend evenings and weekends discovering the vibrant local community right outside your door.', 'Visit parks like Cherry Creek, Washington, and Cheesman for lush greenery and great views of the city, then stop to explore the Denver Botanic Gardens.', 'Discover the variety of local coffee shops, roasteries, breweries, and performance venues that place The Atrii Apartments in the perfect location to call home.', "Grab a bite or drinks with friends at Jax Fish House and Oyster Bar, Inga's Alpine Tavern, or Bull and Bush Brewery.", "Find out what it's like to experience better living from the comfort of our thriving community.", 'Contact The Atrii Apartments today!', 'Features', '- Granite Countertops', '- Heating and Air Conditioning', '- Plank-Style Wood Flooring*', '- Black Appliances', '* Select Units Only', 'Community Amenities', '- Charcoal BBQ Grills with Firepit Seating Area', '- Fitness Center', '- TV Lounge', '- Conveniently Located Close to Local Dining, Shopping, & Entertainment', '- Coffee Bar', '- Pool with Sundeck', '- Bike Storage', '- Business Center & Conference Room', '- Carports Available', '- Great Neighborhood', '- Pool Table', '- Courtyard', '- Professional & Responsive Management', '- Laundry Facilities', '- Elevators In Each Building', '- Controlled Access', 'Pet Policy', 'Up to 2 pets per apartment.', 'Breed restrictions do apply.', 'Non refundable pet deposit.', 'See your community office for more details.', 'Income Requirements:', '2.5Xs', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday:10:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday:10:00AM-5:00PM', 'Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.', 'oaMIyjr8k08h']
